attributes.action: Punish all People who arm children with knives,guns,and drugs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like the goverment to build an island. Over the 12 miles out to sea. where it is not governed by british, and european laws, so these monsters don't have european human rights, because they take all the rights from the children, and there family's.
put a big wall round it, and next to nothing to eat, if they want to kill each other let them get rid of the scum, its no good putting through our courts, who will put them in prison for a couple of weeks, then give some more money when they get out to kill some more children, you should make an example out of them if they want to make peoples lives hell we should make there lives hell, the trouble is when they go to prison they get treated like children, they are adults when they do these things, to kids.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
